    #include <iostream>
    #include <cstdio>
     
    using namespace std;
     
    bool isprime(int n)
    {
    	for (int i = 2; i < n/2; i++)
    	{
    		if(n % i == 0)
    			return false;
    	}
    	return true;
    }
    bool ispali(int n)
    {
    	int r = n;
    	int rev = 0;
    	while (n)
    	{
    		rev *= 10;
    		rev += n%10;
    		n /= 10;
    	}
    	return rev == r ? true : false;
    }
    int main()
    {
    	int n;
    	cin >> n;
    	for (;;)
    	{
    		if(ispali(n) && isprime(n)){
    			cout << n << endl;
    			break;
    		}
    		else 
    			n++;
    	}
        return 0;
    }
